title: Wheatgerm and Oat Bread
ingredients: ['150g (5 oz) bread flour', '150g (5 oz) wholemeal flour', '4 tablespoons porridge oats', '2 tablespoons wheatgerm', '2 tablespoons honey', '200ml (7 fl oz) semi skimmed milk', '100ml (4 fl oz) water', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon butter', '1/2 teaspoon dried active baking yeast']
